name: Pistachio Blondie | Developed
description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: Skiddlz, AlfredPudding, Max Savage, Graham, folkart, and guest mlNikon. 
This recipe is our representation of a Pistachio, White Chocolate, Blondie. Full Development Notes on DEVELOPED Ep. 7 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Frslep8ui1U
 
Our weekly episodes will be released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST https://www.youtube.com/c/developedDIY
author: Developed

reviews.text: This is delicious. Tpa pistachio never tasted like a pistachio to me, just a different kind of sweetness, but this recipe brings it out really well and puts it on top of a delicious authentic tasting blondie. Great job guys!
Tastes as described the pistachio, almond cookie, and flv give it a nice “crunchy” like texture. The white chocolate in my opinion makes this recipe. Excellent job guys and gal
